comment:
>>37764967

"Sounds like a horse. I'm pretty sure the boss is up ahead." You suggest. "By the by, I got a tip from the fortune-teller that there could be machine blueprints down here; also, this place is guarded by some kind of stone pegasus."

"Blueprints? That sounds my speed." Ayla says. "Leave no stone unturned."

"Ah, damn. You got a useful consultation?" Nel groans. "Mine gave me a stupid tip like you'd see in a loading screen. Did you learn anything else, Ashe?"

"That's about it." You respond. "Nel, do you want to try scouting ahead? See if there's any danger on the upper floors, and if you can see the boss?"

"I can give it a shot... might even be able to map the place out, if I'm quick enough." He responds. "Be careful."

What will you do?
> Talk to the other party about identifying your weapon, and the girl's familiar.
> Talk to the other party about teaming up.
> Split up by twos and take down the Guardian Constructs on the upper floors.
> Stick together and go after the Guardian Constructs.
name: BSO
